LanguageData.VQE_AirlockJammed: Airlock jammed shut. Must be forced open.
LanguageData.VQE_ScavengeDesc: Clean up the {0} while searching for valuable materials.
LanguageData.VQE_StudyBlueprintsDesc: Study the ancient blueprints and diagrams to gain inspiration for the next crafting project.
LanguageData.VQE_StudyBlackBoxDesc: Access the data on the black box to find out what transpired.
LanguageData.VQE_InitiateScanDesc: Initiate the proximity scan to find large signatures in the area. The scan is bound to generate enough of an energy signature to attract a mechanoid hive.
LanguageData.VQE_RestartGeneratorDesc: Restart the cryptogenerator. It has enough fuel to run continuously for three days, after which it will critically meltdown. The strong energy signature is bound to attract the mechanoid hive.
LanguageData.VQE_RestartWarning: Restarting the cryptogenerator will cause continuous mechanoid attacks.
LanguageData.VQE_Alert_CriticalCryptoGenerators_Desc: A cryptogenerator only has enough fuel left for less than a day. When fuel runs out, it will meltdown, destroying everything in radius.
LanguageData.VQE_QuestCompletedMessage: This could be a good opportunity to craft more legendary crypto gear, provided you have the resources to do so. There might not be another opportunity to do that.
